member.name: T:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander
member.summary:
Base class for Material Design Expander ui-element.
This class contains the basic logic for working with the Expander ui-element.
This class is inherited from the class.
This Expander ui-element is not affiliated with the official Material Design guidelines!
This ui-element was created in accordance with one of the sites on Google https://domains.google/#/.

member.name: E:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.OpenedEvent
member.summary: Occurs when the expander finished the animation and is fully opened.

member.name: E:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.OpenEvent
member.summary: Occurs when the expander starting the animation and starts to open.

member.name: E:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.ClosedEvent
member.summary: Occurs when the expander finished the animation and is fully closed.

member.name: E:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.CloseEvent
member.summary: Occurs when the expander starting the animation and starts to close.

member.name: E:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.IsOpenedChangedEvent
member.summary: Occurs when the expander value changed.

member.name: M:MaterialDesign_WPF_Expander.Expander.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary:
This overridden method assign the used ui elements for work Expander-ui element.
Also this overridden method initializes some parameters after loading the composite ui-elements of the Expander.
